alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 2:56AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Talbot, south central Queen Anne`s and southern Caroline Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 256 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Easton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Denton, Ridgely, St. Michaels, Oxford, Queen Anne, Tanyard, Harmony, Smithville, Starr, Skipton, Copperville, Jumptown, Agner, Matthews, Hambleton, Griffin, Cordova and Hillsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
